description: His name and mansion "Redondo House" all inherited from his father, Altajid Redondo. He is a princely figure living in Templer. He became the Shard Champion after winning the Shard Casters tournament. For fun he wears a mask, and under the name "No Face", likes to rob the townspeople of their riches. He wishes to know whether he or Dumas is stronger, but was denied the chance when Dumas let Zed fight in his place against Rob√®s in the tournament.
name: Robes Redondo
